item.title: Israel Chooses Arabic-Language Drama ‘The Sea,’ Starring a Palestinian Teenager, for the Oscars International Feature Race
item.description: “The Sea,” a poignant drama about a Palestinian boy from who risks his life to go to the beach for the first time in Tel Aviv, will represent Israel in the international feature race at th
